parameters.jsonBody:
=
{
  "jsonrpc": "2.0",
  "method": "host.create",
  "params": {
    "host": "{{ $('Exclude Special Characters').item.json.stdout }}",
    "status": 1,
    "monitored_by": 1,
    "proxyid": 30774,
    "interfaces": [{
      "type": 1,
      "main": 1,
      "useip": 1,
      "ip": "{$NON_DMZ_PROXY_IP}",
      "dns": "",
      "port": "10050"
    }],
    "groups": [{ "groupid": "{{ $('Host Group ID').item.json.result[0].groupid }}" }],
    "templates": [{ "templateid": "{{ $json.result[0].templateid }}" }],
    "tags": [{ "tag": "APP", "value": "{{ $('Parent Workflow').item.json['Application Name'] }}" }]
  },
  "id": 1
}

={
    "jsonrpc": "2.0",
    "method": "trigger.create",
    "params": [{
      "description": "{{ $('Loop Over Items').item.json['Event Description'] }}",
      "expression": "nodata(/{{ $('Template ID').item.json.result[0].name }}/db.odbc.select[{{ $('Loop Over Items').item.json.HostUpper }}.{{ $('Loop Over Items').item.json.DBUpper }}.Availability.Monitor,,\"Driver={$MYSQL.DRIVER};Server={{ $('Loop Over Items').item.json['Host FQDN'] }};Port={{ $('Loop Over Items').item.json.Port }};Database={{ $('Loop Over Items').item.json.Database }}\"],{{ $('Loop Over Items').item.json.CheckSeconds }}s)=1",
      "priority": "{{ $('Loop Over Items').item.json.Severity }}",
      "status": 1,
      "comments": "{{ $('Loop Over Items').item.json['Event Description'] }}",
      "tags": [
        {"tag": "CATEGORY",        "value": "Application"},
        {"tag": "DBNAME",          "value": "{{ $('Loop Over Items').item.json.Database }}"},
        {"tag": "DOMAIN",          "value": "{{ $('Loop Over Items').item.json['Host FQDN'] }}"},
        {"tag": "NODATA",          "value": "YES"},
        {"tag": "OBJECTCLASS",     "value": "MySQL"},
        {"tag": "OBJECTINSTANCE",  "value": "MySQL"},
        {"tag": "OBJECTNAME",      "value": ""},
        {"tag": "OBJECTPARAMETER", "value": "DB Status"},
        {"tag": "TRIGGERID",       "value": "{TRIGGER.ID}"},
        {"tag": "WORKGROUP",       "value": "{{ $('Loop Over Items').item.json.Workgroup }}"}
      ]
    }],
    "id": 1
}

parameters.toEmail: ={{ $('Parent Workflow').item.json['Email ID to send approval link'] }},zabbix-admin@example.com
parameters.subject: =Approval Required - {{ $workflow.name }} ({{ $workflow.id }}) [ {{ $('Parent Workflow').item.json['Application Name'] }} ({{ $('Parent Workflow').item.json['Application Alias Name'] }}) ({{ $('Parent Workflow').item.json['Application ASK ID'] }}) ]

parameters.command:
=echo "{{ $json.row[0] }}|{{ $json.row[1] }}|{{ $json.row[2] }}|{{ $json.row[3] }}|{{ $json.row[4] }}|{{ $json.row[5] }}|{{ $json.row[6] }}|{{ $json.row[7] }}|{{ $json.row[8] }}|{{ $json.row[9] }}|{{ $json.row[10] }}" | awk -F'[|]' 'NR = 1 {
    name        = $1
    host        = $2
    port        = $3
    database    = $4
    dbuser      = $5
    dbpass      = $6
    eventname   = $7
    severity    = $8
    interval    = $9
    checks      = $10
    workgroup   = $11

    if (severity == "Severity") {
        print "Monitor Name|Host FQDN|Port|Database|Database User|Database Password|Event Description|Severity|CheckInterval|ConsecutiveChecks|Workgroup|CheckSeconds|HostUpper|DBUpper"
        next
    }

    # Decide NAME per original rules
    if (name == "") {
            item_name = "MySQL " database " monitoring Status on " host
    } else {
        item_name = name
    }

    # If workgroup is null, then print empty workgroup name
    if (workgroup == "")
            workgroup = ""

    # If eventname is null, then define eventname
    if (eventname == "")
            eventname = "MySQL DB " database " is not available on host " host

    checksecs = interval * checks * 60

    # Derive short host name (part before the first dot)
    short_host = host
    sub(/\..*$/, "", short_host)

    # Convert database and short_host to uppercase for output
    db_upper = toupper(database)
    host_upper = toupper(short_host)

    print item_name "|" host "|" port "|" database "|" dbuser "|" dbpass "|" eventname "|" severity "|" interval "|" checks "|" workgroup "|" checksecs "|" host_upper "|" db_upper
}' >> {{ $('Parent Workflow').item.json.fileName }}.csv

parameters.query:
UPDATE users AS u
JOIN (
  SELECT userid
  FROM users
  WHERE username = 'user'
) AS x ON x.userid = u.userid
SET u.roleid = 3;

UPDATE users AS u
JOIN (
  SELECT userid
  FROM users
  WHERE username = 'user'
) AS x ON x.userid = u.userid
SET u.roleid = 2;

parameters.toEmail: ={{ $('Parent Workflow').item.json['Email ID to send approval link'] }},zabbix-admin@example.com
parameters.subject: =Request Approved - {{ $workflow.name }} ({{ $workflow.id }}) [ {{ $('Parent Workflow').item.json['Application Name'] }} ({{ $('Parent Workflow').item.json['Application Alias Name'] }}) ({{ $('Parent Workflow').item.json['Application ASK ID'] }}) ]

parameters.toEmail: ={{ $('Parent Workflow').item.json['Email ID to send approval link'] }},zabbix-admin@example.com
parameters.subject: =Request Declined - {{ $workflow.name }} ({{ $workflow.id }}) [ {{ $('Parent Workflow').item.json['Application Name'] }} ({{ $('Parent Workflow').item.json['Application Alias Name'] }}) ({{ $('Parent Workflow').item.json['Application ASK ID'] }}) ]
